text: The new century opened with James 1 ascending the throne. He was quite prepared to be tolerant towards Rome though the Gunpowder Plot spoiled that. The Puritans were dashed. True, a new Prayer Book was issued in 1604 but the Puritans derived little comfort from it.
handwritten_text: The new century opened with James 1 ascending the throne. He was quite prepared to be tolerant towards Rome though the Gunpowder Plot spoiled that. The Puritans were dashed. True, a new Prayer Book was issued in 1604 but the Puritans derived little comfort from it.
